title: Trolls
body: Hello Everyone, i am a gold 3 player and i have had 3 games in a row were i have been forced to dodge because of children not getting the roles they wanted and going for the classic disco nunu, because of this i have been gave a 30 min queue dodge timer which is stupid, but it would help me ease the pain if In the near future will their be a way to report these people before the champ select and if their is already can someone please tell me, thank you for your time.

replies.body:
Maybe all they can play is Nunu? I'm an Evelynn one-trick but I can also play Annie. Excluding those, I'm utter garbage at every single champion. 

So, when I'm auto-filled into ADC, I pick Annie. Not because she's good at ADC or I'm trolling or I'm "breaking the meta", but because Annie would be better at ADC than Evelynn. If I were to pick an actual ADC, no matter how well I play, I'll still end up feeding and losing the game. At least with Annie, I have a chance of not feeding and winning.

But I agree with you. There should be a Troll Report thing in Champ Select.
you can take a screencap and send it in i think, annoying when you get more than 1 in a row tho
